incidents.title: Multiple Storm reports in Southern California
incidents.description: 2 reports of storm activity in Southern California

source_tweets.text:
Atmospheric river moving into Southern California, bringing possible flooding and¬†mudflows

An atmospheric river sweeping California is bringing some rain to the southern part of the state, with more than 20 million people under flood watch advisories. CBS News reporter Andres Gutierrez has more‚Ä¶
source_tweets.author: articleweblog.bsky.social

source_tweets.text: Southern California just went from wildfire smoke to flash floods in days. This isn‚Äôt ‚Äúbad luck‚Äù‚Äîit‚Äôs a  txtbook climate chain reaction. Fires dry the land, rains hit bare slopes, floods follow. We need mitigation and adaptation. Climate doesn't wait for debates. #ClimateCrisis
source_tweets.author: farhadali77.bsky.social
